name: Datapoint [Tech Demo]
description:
This is a tech-demo that was made in Allium Engine, my own game engine.

Become involved in future game development by joining the discord server!

Read README.txt in the game's local files for how to play and change settings (like enable shadows)

Internal Features

  • Saving and loading game
  • Chunk handling w/ entities
  • Procedurally generated terrain
  • Event handling

CREDITS
